itunes:title: #105: Going Thru Transition is Okay
title: #105: Going Thru Transition is Okay
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: It seems like we're all in a place of transition right now, trying to determine our new normal.  Hear some encouragement about why transitioning is totally okay. RESOURCES MENTIONED   Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to...
itunes:summary:
It seems like we're all in a place of transition right now, trying to determine our new normal. 

Hear some encouragement about why transitioning is totally okay.

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • The Healed and Loved Woman Membership
  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Get our free download - The 5 Step Roadmap to Heal Love Addiction
  • Apply to work together in the Recovery School  - Click here to pre-apply!
  • Learn that YOU ARE WORTHY  - Enroll in You Are Worthy here

 

CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE

Instagram: @BlackGirlsHeal
Facebook: Black Girls Heal
Website: Blackgirlsheal.org
